scripts:
set ACL for dataWriteService
	allow jcr:all on /content
end

set ACL for dataWriteService
	allow jcr:all on /etc
end

set ACL for dataWriteService
	allow jcr:all on /etc/bookings
end

set ACL for dataWriteService
	allow jcr:all on /etc/bookings/*
end

set ACL for dataWriteService
	allow jcr:all on /etc/users
end

set ACL for dataWriteService
	allow jcr:all on /etc/admin
end

set ACL for dataWriteService
	allow jcr:all on /etc/users/*
end

set ACL for dataWriteService
	allow jcr:all on /etc/admin/*
end

set ACL for dataWriteService
	allow jcr:read on /home
end
